name: Thicc Buster Videos: Be Kind, Rewind
name_original: Thicc Buster Videos: Be Kind, Rewind
description:
Thicc Buster Videos Training Guide

Hey Bros and Brodettes welcome to Thicc Buster Videos. You have one job to do....rewind the tapes and get paid. If you don't do your job though....you don't get paid....and when rent comes due well.....you're through.

I'll lay it out for you to make it nice and easy

Instructions:
  1. Pickup the tapes from the bin on the left
  2. Take the tape to the Queue workbench at the bottom
  3. Go to the Rewinder and slap that E button
  4. When the tape is done rewinding pick it up from the Ready table
  5. Drop it off in the finished bin on the right
Controls:

Movement: WASD
Rewind Tape: E

Game was made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2
